name: @native-twin/dev-tools
description: A new DevTools plugin created by create-dev-plugin

scripts.build:all: expo-module prepare && cd webui && npx expo export -p web --output-dir ../dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: expo-module prepare && expo-module prepublishOnly && cd webui && npx expo export -p web --output-dir ../dist
scripts.web:export: cd webui && npx expo export -p web --output-dir ../dist
